sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-table :data="staffDataList" stripe style="width: 100%">
        <el-table-column prop="empId" label="员工ID" width="75" align="center"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="name" label="姓名" width="50" align="center"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="sex" label="性别" width="50" align="center"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="salary" label="工资" width="50" align="center"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="jobId" label="工作ID" width="75" align="center"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="phoneNum" label="电话" width="100" align="center"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="departmentId" label="部门ID" width="75" align="center"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="post" label="职位" width="50" align="center"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column prop="isDelete" label="是否离职" width="100" align="center"></el-table-column>
    </el-table>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name:'AllStaffView',
    data() {
        return {
            staffDataList:this.staffList
        }
    },
    props:['staffList'],
    created () {
        console.log('A',this.staffList);
    }
}
</script>

<style></style>
